meanings: (돈·비용 등의) claim, (돈·비용 등을) claim, charge, make[file, put in] a claim, (요구하다) ask, demand, (법적으로) file (for)

vlive.korean: [머뭇머뭇] 영수증 청구해도 돼요? [Hesitant] Can I charge it to you? 듣기 View video OSEN : iKON 아이콘 'Star Road' EP.19
vlive.english: [Hesitant] Can I charge it to you?

vlive.korean: 그러면 가입비는 이따가 청구하도록 하고요. We'll take the registration fee later. 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#64. 아이돌 뮤직쇼! 동전가왕 (w. 펜타곤 진호, 골든차일드 주찬, SF9 인성)
vlive.english: We'll take the registration fee later.

vlive.korean: 본인이 부순 걸 왜 손님한테 청구하죠? Why do you charge customers if you break their cars down? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2018 - EP.47
vlive.english: Why do you charge customers if you break their cars down?

vlive.korean: 영장 청구요? File arrest warrants? 듣기 View video 날아올라 (AIM HIGH) : [날아올라]1화_선처는 없다
손해배상을 청구하셨습니다. So here's your "Compensation Award". 듣기 View video FANGUIN TV : [Son Ho Young] 손호영 솔로데뷔 10주년 기념 LIVE

examples.korean: Prompt payment of the invoice would be appreciated. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 청구 대금을 즉각 지불해 주시면 고맙겠습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
